questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes?
Is your regular brand?
questions.answer: Low/1 mg Tar, Medium, Ultra/Extra Low Tar, Full Flavor, Light/Mild

questions.question: Do you usually buy it by the?
How long have you smoked this brand?
questions.answer: Less than 1 year, 1 to 2 years, 2 to 3 years, 3 to 5 years, Over 5 years

questions.question: What, if any, was your previous brand?
The next time you go to the store if your regular brand were not available, what would you do?
questions.answer: Go to another store to buy my regular brand, Buy another type or length of my regular brand, Wait until the store has my regular brand, Buy a different brand entirely

questions.question: Which of the following statements best describes the way you use cigarette coupons?
questions.answer: I use almost any cigarette coupon I get, I occasionally use coupons for cigarettes even if not my regular brand, I never use coupons to buy cigarettes, I only use coupons if they are for my regular brand

questions.question: How often do you use special in-store cigarette offers?
Which of the following best describes you?
questions.answer: White, African-American, Hispanic, Asian, American Indian, Other

questions.question: Is there another smoker in your household 21 years of age or older?
Would you be interested in receiving information about issues that affect smokers?
Would you be interested in joining a smokers group to help protect your right to smoke?
